title: Discover Your Tale through AI
subtitle: Step into the world of ancient wisdom and find your spirit animal from Kalila wa Dimna!

quiz.loader1: Now we have a guess about your spirit animal. Let’s discover your adventure!
quiz.loader2: Let’s reveal your spirit animal and go on an AI-generated adventure made just for you!

q0.text: Who would you like your character to be in the story?

q1.text: What would you do if you saw two friends arguing?
q1.a1: Try to help them talk it out
q1.a2: Stay out of it, it's not your problem
q1.a3: Jump in and make a joke to lighten the mood
q1.a4: Calm them both down with a soft word

q2.text: Which superpower would you like to have?
q2.a3: The power to carry big things and protect
q2.a4: The ability to live long and stay calm

q4.text: What kind of adventure would you love to go on?
q4.a2: Solving a mystery in a castle
q4.a3: Helping a friend across a river
q4.a5: Visiting a place full of magic and wonder

q5.text: What kind of story world sounds the most fun to you?
q5.a1: A jungle full of friendly animals and wise teachers who help you learn important lessons
q5.a2: A shiny golden palace where big things happen and every story has a strong message
q5.a3: A peaceful garden with pretty birds and soft stories that make you think
q5.a4: A silly forest where animals talk in rhymes and every tale has a funny twist at the end

Please enter your name to continue: Please enter your name to continue
print message: You may collect your printed story from the reception desk.
